title: YAR HAR FIDDLE DEE DEE (Pirate GP Club)
body: Hey everyone, I recently started playing Gangplank because I'm addicted to Pirates so I decided to make a group to band these people together. You don't even have to own GP, if you love pirates or gangplank or just want to join for no reason at all, send me a friend request and Il invite ya to the group. YAR HAR FIDDLE DEE DEE BEING A PIRATE IS ALRIGHT WITH ME{{champion:41}} !

replies.body: Yes buddy invite buddy love gp and im gp main hehe xd
